util:properties.prop: select APPL_NO,PHONE_NO,CALL_CNT,CALL_LEN,CALL_IN_CNT,CALL_OUT_CNT,CREATE_TIME from network.ca_bur_operator_contact where APPL_NO =? and PHONE_NO is not null
select member_id as memberId,cellphone as phone,order_no as orderNo from network.apply_info where apply_no = ?
select cellphone as phone from network.apply_info where apply_no = ?
select member_id as memberId from network.apply_info where apply_no = ?
select order_no as orderNo from network.apply_info where apply_no = ?
select a.member_id as memberId,a.mobile as phone,b.apply_no as applyNo from network.money_box_order a left join network.apply_info b on a.order_no = b.order_no where a.order_no = ?
select member_id as memberId from network.money_box_order where order_no = ?
select ID_PREFIX,PROVINCE,CITY from credit_audit.ca_sys_value_id_area
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM member_index where apply_no = ? and index_name = "contact_accept_member_num"
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM member_index where apply_no = ? and order_no is null and index_name = "contact_accept_member_num"
update member_index set order_no = ? where apply_no = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM member_index where order_no = ? and index_name = "has_appl_num"
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM member_index where apply_no = ? and index_name = "has_appl_num"
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM member_index where order_no = ? and index_name = "has_device_num"
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM member_index where apply_no = ? and index_name = "has_device_num"
update member_index set apply_no = ? where order_no = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM phonetag_index where apply_no = ? and order_no is null
update phonetag_index set order_no = ? where apply_no = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM phonetag_index where apply_no = ? and member_id is null
update phonetag_index set member_id = ? where apply_no = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM device_index where apply_no = ? and deviceId = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num FROM device_index where order_no = ? and deviceId = ?
insert into member_index (member_id, apply_no, order_no,mobile,index_name,direct,create_time,apply_status,order_status) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,now(),?,?)
insert into phonetag_index (member_id, apply_no, order_no,mobile,index_name,direct,indirect,create_time) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,now())
insert into device_index (member_id, apply_no, order_no,mobile,deviceId,index_name,direct,create_time) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,now())
insert into ip_index (member_id, apply_no, order_no,mobile,ip,index_name,direct,create_time) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,now())
select from Apply where applyNo=?
select from Order where orderNo=?
select in("PhoneHasApply").phone as phone,in("MemberHasApply").memberId as memberId,out("ApplyHasOrder").orderNo as orderNo from apply where applyNo = ? unwind phone,memberId,orderNo
select in("PhoneHasOrder").phone as phone,in("MemberHasOrder").memberId as memberId,in("ApplyHasOrder").applyNo as applyNo from order where orderNo = ? unwind phone,memberId,applyNo
select out("ApplyHasOrder").orderNo as orderNo,out("ApplyHasOrder").originalStatus as orderStatus from apply where applyNo = ? unwind orderNo,orderStatus
select in("ApplyHasOrder").applyNo as applyNo,in("ApplyHasOrder").originalStatus as applyStatus from order where orderNo = ? unwind applyNo,applyStatus
select in("PhoneHasApply").phone as phone,originalStatus as applyStatus from apply where applyNo = ? unwind phone,applyStatus
select expand(in("MemberHasApply")) from
select expand(in("MemberHasOrder")) from
select expand(in("PhoneHasApply")) from
update Apply set applyNo=? upsert return after where applyNo=?
update Apply set applyNo=?,status=?,originalStatus=?,createdDatetime=? upsert return after where applyNo=?
update Apply set applyNo=?,createdDatetime=? upsert return after where applyNo=?
update Apply set applyNo=?,status=? upsert return after where applyNo=?
update Order set orderNo=? upsert return after where orderNo=?
update Order set orderNo=?,status=?,originalStatus=?,amount=?,createdDatetime=? upsert return after where orderNo=?
select from (select expand(out_{0}) from {1}) where in = {2}
create edge CallTo from {0} to {1} set callCnt = ?,callLen=?,callInCnt=?,callOutCnt=?,reportTime=?
update edge {0} set callCnt = ?,callLen=?,callInCnt=?,callOutCnt=?,reportTime=?
update Member set isOverdue=true where memberId=?
select from Phone where phone=?
update Phone set phone=? upsert return after where phone=?
select from PhoneMark where mark=?
update PhoneMark set mark=? upsert return after where mark=?
select from PhoneSource where source=?
update PhoneSource set source=? upsert return after where source=?
select from Device where deviceId=?
update Device set deviceId=? upsert return after where deviceId=?
select from Ip where ip=?
update Ip set ip=?,ipCity=? upsert return after where ip=?
select from Member where memberId=?
update Member set memberId=? upsert return after where memberId=?
update Member set memberId=?,phone=?,isBlack=false,isOverdue=false upsert return after where memberId=?
update Member set memberId=?,name=?,idNo=?,province=?,city=? upsert return after where memberId=?
select from Store where storeId=?
update Store set storeId=? upsert return after where storeId=?
select out("MemberHasApply").size() as MemberHasApplySize,out("MemberHasOrder").size() as MemberHasOrderSize,@rid as members0 from member where memberId = ?
select out("MemberHasDevice").size() as MemberHasDeviceSize,out("MemberHasIp").size() as MemberHasIpSize from member where memberId = ?

select out("MemberHasDevice").size() as MemberHasDeviceSize,out("MemberHasIp").size() as MemberHasIpSize,out("MemberHasApply").size() as MemberHasApplySize,out("MemberHasOrder").size() as MemberHasOrderSize,@rid as members0 from member where memberId = ?
select @rid as phoneRid0,phone as phone, unionall(in_CallTo,out_CallTo) as callTos,in("HasPhone") as members0 from Phone where phone = ?
select in("MemberHasDevice").size() as MemberHasDeviceSize from device where deviceId = ?
select in("MemberHasIp").size() as MemberHasIpSize from ip where ip = ?
